name: Dustin Bush
text: What can I say aside from i love the place! Hungry Howie's is always a good choice for dinner, especially on the days when you can figure out what to make! Personally I like the pizzas lite cooked, i just think there normal cooking time is ‚Ä¶More

name: Cindy Martini
text: Ordered delivery a couple Friday nights ago. Jets for what ever reason wasn't delivering and it was only 8:00 on a Friday night. Ordered subs from Howie's and they were amazing. Delivery was punctual, friendly and great. The subs were beyond delicious! We'll definitely order again.

text: I love their rewards program! & their butter cheese crust is great üòã

text: It‚Äôs really disappointing when you pay 1.99 for toppings are there is hardly any of the one topping you asked for!

text: I thought their subs were supposed to have lettuce and tomato in it but nope nothing but chicken bacon and ranch.....not impressed

name: Matt C
text: Fantastic pizza and great service!

name: Brian Starlin
text: Ordered pizza for lunch at work took over an hour to deliver a pizza 2 miles away from the location and the pizza arrived cold!  Last time I'll order from hungry Howie's!

name: Lori Kowalewski
text: Ordered a pizza was told 15 minutes showed up in 20 minutes was told there behind it's going to be another 10 minutes had to be somewhere at a certain time.

name: Zara Kingma
text: Everytime we order from them the last 6 months the order is never correct. Who wants to call and complain over sauces missing. Subs not cooked completely. I have been a very avid customer for years. This is my last time ordering

text: Poor management, fired my daughter through texting, even though she worked almost everyday ü§î no warning system, no sit down talk.....A TEXT.... I manage a place as well and this was not professional let alone she's crushed!!!!!

text: I think this is the best pizza around for a chain pizza place. I wish they had more than one store in Holland tho...I hate having to drive to the northside to get it

text: Ordered in store. Took about 15 min to get it. I ordered 2 medium and bread sticks. The person working the front was very helpful and polite.  Would recommend if looking for good pizza.

name: #1 George
text: The 3 cheeser pleaser ,with that butterchese crust is great

name: Bailey Bully
text: Nice grab and go pizza place. Staff was nice and very helpful

name: Anastasia Glover
text: I love this store. The only pizza place I'll order from and I work at a pizza shop. Very friendly drivers and always quick service. Foods always amazing. Thank you ;)

text: Hungry Howies pizza was sooo good and there bread sticks are amazing!!!!!!

name: Melissa Klaasen
text: Quick service. Tasty pizza!

name: Shrinivas Rathi
text: We thought it's a dine in location but it's just a carry out or pick up location. Whereas other information on public domain is showing as pizza restaurant. Would advise to update the information as it's misleading

name: Jacob Veenstra
text: Decent place if you're not in the mood to go down town. Staff is friendly, and orders have always been made correctly.

name: Shannon Fahey Bonebrake
text: I love thier pizza. They have amazing garlic cheesy bread. I do not like the fact that thin pizza does not come in extra large. And the wings are usually dry. But good when made right. Prices are somewhat decent and they always have deals going on. Delivery service is fast.

name: Skie Burchard
text: After being a valued customer for years using my account I was greeted with disgust by the manager when entering the store. Asking why I used a fake phone number when it was in fact a real number and was told if I use my account name again ‚Ä¶More

name: Lynnette Rumsey
text: Good all around pizza. i like the flavored crust. I got the garlic crust.

name: Russell Boerigter
text: Very friendly service. Usually quicker than estimated time. Easy to order online or over the phone. Not much space to sit and wait. I come here almost every week. Nice variety on the menu.

name: Tammy DeRooy
text: Fast friendly service and food was Hot when we got there. We ordered Takeout and it was done the exact time they said it would be. Great flavor and portion size.

name: Melanie Mott
text: Speedy and personable!

name: Kevin Cornell
text: It's pretty much what you'd expect. Decent food and priced ok. The waiting area is TINY though and their staff.... well.... Not the brightest crayons in the shed or the sharpest tools in the box and have messed up orders several times. Their ranch crust is amazing though.

name: Bella Perez
text: The best pizza hands down and their small pizza for five bucks with everything crust is ü§§ü§§ü§§üíÅüèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è i always get half pineapple and ham with half bacon and sausage light cheese and extra sauce ‚úÖ

name: Molly McVay-Walters
text: Very delicious subs, unlike any I've had before!  Plus they deliver without a minimum  dollar amount, so I can order just a sub & it's on it's way to me.  I'm definitely hooked on their subs but their pizzas are just as terrific!!  You have to try it to believe it!!

name: Dave Tipp
text: Pizzas were good, crust was a bit strong. Flavoured crust is not my thing.

name: Richard Visser
text: $5.30 for a small pizza at lunch. Always ready when I get there. Friendly people. Best chain pizza. What more could you ask for?

name: Christopher Phelps
text: Fast friendly service, good deals on good food.

name: Mina Soulivong
text: Ordered delivery and delivery lady got mad that i didnt tip and also tried to make me feel bad and had an attitude after i said no. Sorry, if i was the one who paid for the order then i wouldve tipped. Wasnt my card that bought the order.

name: Charles Beattie
text: In from out of town. Stopped and grabbed a pizza for dinner it was a great pizza.

name: Jennifer Leatherman
text: Very good pizza for the price.

name: Jean Cuddington
text: It was fast .and it was good

name: Danielle Lee
text: This hungry Howie's not a good one. Employee not to bright and they got our order wrong and didn't even apologize for it. Kind of rude. I wouldn't recommend this location. I am very displeased!!!

name: 5lleighl16
text: I love the Hungry Howies food! By far my favorite place to get pizza and Howie Rolls and Calzones. Every time I've been in to the several different ones I go to, I've always gotten in and out very quickly. Food is always great.

name: Ashli Saavedra Morin
text: Great food and customer service. Always on time for carry out and delivery!

name: Rachael Garcia
text: I would rate a 0 if I could.  I ordered a pizza online with a wait of 45 mins and and had to call to make sure it was received. When I got the pizza after 1 hour and 30 Mins It was literally black. Even the driver said sorry about my order.  Will never order again

name: amanda y miguel ortiz
text: Wonderful staff and excellent customer service!!!! Always friendly and goes above and beyond for their customers.  Tip your drivers guys!!!!!

name: Amy Ramirez
text: Just got my order...this is the sorriest looking pizza ive seen come out of their ovens..If i wanted a dried up looking pizza that wasnt even cut properly i would of gone to little ceasers..I got there 10 minutes after i ordered and it was ready hmmmmn .

text: Love the flavored crust.

text: Family friendly menu and courteous staff makes me go back often.

text: Great people great pizza great service I think his name was Lucus and he took very good care of me !
